jmvtools 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Interactive data tables

    jmv_datatables.Rd

    Interactive data tables

    Usage

    jmv_datatables(df, digits = 2, ...)

    Arguments

    df

    Data frame

    digits

    Number of digits to include in formatted numbers.

    ...

    Additional parameters to pass to DT::datatable

    Value

    Embedded HTML data table, DT::datatable object

    Examples

    
jmv_datatables(mtcars)
